TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Menu extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public MustInherit Class Menu Inherits Component
public ref class Menu abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 表示所有功能表的基礎功能。

span.span: Represents the base functionality for all menus.

summary.span: 雖然 和 會在之前版本的 控制項中取代及新增功能，您還是可以選擇保留 以提供回溯相容性以及供未來使用。

span.span: Although and replace and add functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是基底類別， ，和類別。This class is the base class for the , , and classes. 您無法建立此類別的執行個體。You cannot create an instance of this class. 應用程式組成的功能表物件。The menus for an application consist of objects. 這些可以包含其他物件，代表子功能表項目。These can contain other objects, representing submenu items. 物件，請儲存於顯示為表單的整個功能表結構或用來顯示快顯功能表。The objects can be stored in a for display as an entire menu structure for a form or a that is used to display shortcut menus. 這個類別會提供功能表的所有類別的通用功能。This class provides functionality that is common for all the menu classes. 不同於許多的基底類別，類別用以其衍生的類別定義許多屬性。Unlike many base classes, the class uses its derived classes to define many of its properties. 如果您使用您的功能表中的多重文件介面 (MDI) 應用程式，您可以使用屬性來指定應用程式中顯示一份開啟的 MDI 子表單。If you are using your menu in a multiple-document interface (MDI) application, you can use the property to specify a that displays a list of open MDI child forms in your application. 屬性包含一份功能表類別中所儲存的物件。The property contains a list of objects stored in the menu class. 針對或是，此屬性包含所有顯示的物件。For a or , this property contains all the objects that are displayed. 針對，則屬性代表與其關聯的子功能表項目。For a , the property represents the submenu items associated with it. 除了針對所有的功能表在衍生的類別中，所提供的屬性類別也會提供方法，例如和，可讓您從現有的功能表中，建立新的功能表，也會合併兩個功能表結構在一起。In addition to the properties that are provided for all the derived menu classes, the class also provides methods, such as and , that enable you to create new menus from existing menus, and also merge two menu structures together. 類別也會定義巢狀的類別。The class also defines the nested class . 這個類別定義的集合所使用的物件屬性。This class defines the collection of objects used by the property. 您可以使用的方法類別來新增和移除功能表項目， ，或。You can use the methods of the class to add and remove menu items from a , , or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別中， ，以建立表單功能表結構。The following code example uses the derived class, , to create a menu structure for a form. 範例程式碼加入來代表最上層功能表項目中，選取字型的大小，會將子功能表項目新增到它，然後將兩個功能表項目新增至該功能表項目，表示應用程式中的大型和小型的字型選項。The example code adds a to represent the top-level menu item, adds a submenu item to it for selecting a font size, and then adds two submenu items to that menu item that represent large and small font choices in an application. 這個範例需要有名為物件`mainMenu1`和第四個命名的物件`menuItem1`， `menuItem2`， `menuItem3`，和`menuItem4`。The example requires that there is a object named `mainMenu1` and four objects named `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`. [!code-cpp[Classic Menu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Menu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Menu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為為抽象類別只能繼承的類別可以呼叫功能表的建構函式。Since is an abstract class, only inherited classes can call the Menu constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig instance void CloneMenu(class System.Windows.Forms.Menu menuSrc) cil managed
Protected Friend Sub CloneMenu (menuSrc As Menu)

span.span: The to copy.

summary.span: 將以參數傳遞的 複製到目前的 。

span.span: Copies the that is passed as a parameter to the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會複製整份物件 (儲存在傳入至`menuSrc`) 到目前的功能表。This method copies the entire list of objects (stored in the passed in to `menuSrc`) into the current menu. 您也可以在您的衍生類別中使用這個方法，複製物件。You can use this method in your derived class to clone objects. 他們接著可重複使用由其他類別衍生自，這類， ，和。They can then be reused by other classes that derive from , such as , , and . ## Examples 這個範例會建立主功能表中， `mainMenu1`，具有三個功能表項目： `File`， `Edit`，和`View`。This example creates a main menu, `mainMenu1`, with three menu items: `File`, `Edit`, and `View`. 然後它會使用方法，將複製`mainMenu1`到`mainMenu2`。It then uses the method to copy `mainMenu1` into `mainMenu2`. 複製的功能表然後指派給表單，並顯示。The cloned menu is then assigned to the form and displayed. 此程式需要，您已經建立名為`Form1`。This program requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[CloneMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CloneMenu/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CloneMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CloneMenu/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CloneMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CloneMenu/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓它所佔用的記憶體可以回收記憶體回收。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則，資源會使用之前，將不會釋放記憶體回收集合呼叫物件的解構函式。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu GetContextMenu() cil managed

summary.span: 取得含有這個功能表的 。

span.span: Gets the that contains this menu.
The that contains this menu.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您取得的參考中包含這個功能表。This method allows you to obtain a reference to the that this menu is contained in. 這個屬性會傳回`null`如果功能表未包含在。This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a . 如果功能表包含在這可能會發生或，或如果功能表未包含任何功能表中。This can occur if the menu is contained in a or , or if the menu is not contained in any menu. 判斷是否目前正在使用的功能表，並決定在何處，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where. ## Examples 在此範例中，您可以使用方法，以取得參考的捷徑功能表，其中包含`menuItem1`或`menuItem2`，並在訊息方塊中顯示的捷徑功能表的資訊。In this example, you use the method to obtain a reference to the shortcut menu that contains `menuItem1` or `menuItem2`, and display the shortcut menu information in a message box. 您透過程式設計方式建立兩個項目，快顯功能表`New`和`Open`。You programmatically create a shortcut menu with two items, `New` and `Open`. 然後建立適當的事件處理常式，將功能新增至這些項目。You then add functionality to these items by creating the appropriate event handlers. 當您執行範例時，您會取得一個訊息方塊，會告訴您以滑鼠右鍵按一下以顯示快顯功能表的表單。When you run the example, you get a message box that tells you to right-click the form in order to display the shortcut menu. 然後，當您按一下的功能表項目時，您會取得另一則訊息，告知已按下哪些項目，並會顯示在所包含的捷徑功能表上的資訊。Then, when you click a menu item, you get another message that tells which item has been clicked and displays the information on the containing shortcut menu. 這個範例需要您已建立名為`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetContextMenu2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetContextMenu2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetContextMenu2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetContextMenu2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetContextMenu2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetContextMenu2/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu GetMainMenu() cil managed

summary.span: 取得含有這個功能表的 。

span.span: Gets the that contains this menu.
The that contains this menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您取得的參考目前位於此功能表。This method allows you to obtain a reference to the this menu is currently located in. 這個屬性會傳回`null`如果功能表未包含在。This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a . 如果功能表包含在這可能會發生或，或如果功能表未包含任何功能表中。This can occur if the menu is contained in a or , or if the menu is not contained in any menu. 判斷是否目前正在使用的功能表，並決定在何處，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where. ## Examples 這個範例會宣告， `mainMenu1`，和四個功能表項目， `menuItem1`， `menuItem2`， `menuItem3`，和`menuItem4`。This example declares a , `mainMenu1`, and four menu items, `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`. 只有第一個的三個功能表項目會加入`mainMenu1`顯示。Only the first three menu items are added to `mainMenu1` for display. 程式接著會檢查是否`menuItem3`正在使用，也就是`true`，並判斷的表單中使用。The program then checks to see if `menuItem3` is being used, which is `true`, and determines the form in which it is used. 標籤文字來顯示裝載表單的名稱。A label text is used to display the name of the form that hosts the . 如果您變更功能表項目至受測`menuItem4`，條件評估為`false`因為`menuItem4`從未使用過。If you change the menu item being tested to `menuItem4`, the condition evaluates to `false` because `menuItem4` has never been used. 這個範例需要您已建立名為`MyForm`包含名為`label1`。This example requires that you have created a named `MyForm` that includes a named `label1`. [!code-cpp[GetMainMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetMainMenu/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetMainMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetMainMenu/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetMainMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetMainMenu/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來判斷是否有任何物件會指派給此功能表。You can use this method to determine whether any objects are assigned to this menu. 這相當於檢查`null`在屬性。This is equivalent to checking for `null` in the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立具有兩個物件。The following code example creates a with two objects. 然後它會使用屬性來判斷是否`mainMenu1`包含功能表項目。It then uses the property to determine whether `mainMenu1` contains menu items. 如果條件評估`true`，它會設定屬性設`true`並繫結至主功能表。If the condition evaluates `true`, it sets the property to `true` and binds the main menu to the . 此範例中，您需要建立名為`Form1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[IsParent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IsParent/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IsParent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IsParent/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IsParent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IsParent/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來取得目前儲存在功能表的功能表項目清單的參考。You can use this property to obtain a reference to the list of menu items that are currently stored in the menu. 針對並物件，屬性包含在控制項中的整個功能表結構。For and objects, the property contains the entire menu structure in the control. 針對類別，屬性包含與相關聯的子功能表項目清單。For the class, the property contains the list of submenu items associated with the . （這個屬性所提供） 功能表的功能表項目集合的參考，您可以新增和移除功能表項目，判斷總數的功能表項目，與清除的集合中功能表項目清單。With the reference to the collection of menu items for the menu (provided by this property), you can add and remove menu items, determine the total number of menu items, and clear the list of menu items from the collection. 如需有關維護功能表的功能表項目集合的詳細資訊，請參閱文件。For more information on maintaining the menu item collection for a menu, see the documentation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立衍生類別中的執行個體，並新增物件加入至其集合的物件。The following code example creates an instance of the derived class, , and adds a object to its collection of objects. 這個範例需要在此範例中所定義的方法是位於表單的類別，以及該表單類別中的方法所呼叫。This example requires that the method defined in this example is located within the class for a form and called by a method in that form class. summary.span: 將一個功能表的 物件和目前的功能表合併。

span.span: Merges the objects of one menu with the current menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法就會合併一個功能表和目前的功能表中的物件。This method merges objects from one menu with the current menu. 物件會根據合併和屬性。 objects are merged according to the values of the and properties. 功能表合併功能通常是合併與作用中的 MDI 子表單的多個文件介面 (MDI) 父表單的功能表。Menu merging is typically done to merge the menus of a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent form with those of its active MDI child form. 這是由.NET Framework common language runtime 會自動執行。This is performed automatically by the .NET Framework common language runtime. 比方說，如果 MDI 父表單包含一組功能表來處理檔案，而且您的 MDI 子表單也有檔案相關的功能表項目，會自動將功能表集合併成單一檔案 功能表的子表單會顯示在 MDI 父表單時設定。For example, if an MDI parent form contains a set of menus for handling files and your MDI child form also has file-related menu items, the menu sets will automatically merge into a single file menu set when the child form is displayed in the MDI parent form. 您可以使用方法，如果您要合併兩個不屬於 MDI 應用程式的功能表結構。You can use the method if you are merging two menu structures that are not part of an MDI application. 可以呼叫此實作或是類別來合併兩個或多個物件衍生自。This implementation can be called by the or classes to merge two or more objects that derive from . 合併兩個物件使用方法。To merge two objects use the method. ## Examples 這個範例會建立兩個功能表中，`mainMenu1`和`mainMenu2`。This example creates two menus, `mainMenu1` and `mainMenu2`. 第一個功能表可包含一個， `File`，而且第二個包含一， `Edit`。The first menu contains one , `File`, and the second contains one , `Edit`. 使用方法中，`mainMenu2`合併`mainMenu1`。Using the method, `mainMenu2` is merged with `mainMenu1`. 顯示時，`mainMenu1`將包含兩個功能表項目`File`和`Edit`。When displayed, `mainMenu1` will contain the two menu items, `File` and `Edit`. 這個範例需要您已建立名為`Form1`。This example requires that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[MergeMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MergeMenu/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MergeMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MergeMenu/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MergeMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MergeMenu/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 嘗試將此功能表與它自己合併。

span.span: It was attempted to merge the menu with itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在設計階段，此屬性設定為控制項的程式設計識別項。At design time, this property is set to the programmatic identifier of the control. 不過，這個屬性會在執行階段在控制項上具有 並無任何影響。However, this property has no bearing on the control at run time.
